name: Mahjong*
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is one of the most popular board game int the world. Challenge and train your brain with this classic game!

HOW TO PLAY
• Remove all matching tiles to complete a board.

FEATURES
• Over 800+ boards!
• Beautiful graphics and sound effects.
• Easy to play hard to master.
• Hint, Swirl and Shuffle boosters with amazing animation effects.
• Play offline anytime.
• Without time limits.
• Different styles of stages.
• iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xr and iPhone Xs Max support.

Have fun with Mahjong Solitaire: Earth the classic mahjong matching game!
